description: The surprise memory task; shows if the displayed face is new or not.
detail: This variable stores the true value as to whether the displayed face is new or not (not the response from the subject)

description: The surprise memory task; which button (key) should be pressed when the face is new.
detail: This variable stores the value for which key should be pressed when the face is new.
valueInfo: left, left key | right, right key

description: The surprise memory task; which button (key) should be pressed when the face is identified as friendly.
detail: This variable stores the value for which key should be pressed when the face is identified as friendly by participants.
valueInfo: left, left key | right, right key

description: The face flanker task; shows if the trial is congruent or not.
detail: This variable stores the value as to whether the given flanker trial is congruent or not.

description: The face flanker task; shows which stimulus array was displayed in the trial.
detail: This variable stores the value denoting which stimulus array has been displayed in a trial.
valueInfo: 5, right congruent | 6, left congruent | 7, right incongruent | 8, left incongruent

description: The face flanker task; shows if the response is correct or not.
detail: This variable stores the value as to whether the participant has responded correctly.

description: The face flanker task; show which key was pressed by the participant.
detail: This variable stores the value denoting which key has been pressed as a response in the given face flanker task trial.

description: The face flanker task; shows the reported number of errors (for the face flanker task) by the participant.
detail: This variable stores the value reported by the participant as the number of their errors during the face flanker task.

description: The surprise memory task; shows which key was pressed by the participant.
detail: This variable stores the value denoting which key has been pressed as a response in the given surprise memory task trial.

description: The surprise friendly task; shows which key was pressed by the participant.
detail: This variable stores the value denoting which key has been pressed as a response in the given surprise friendly task trial.

description: The surprise task; contains the directory to the face image file that is shown during the surprise task trial.
detail: This variable stores the directory address for the surprise face shown in each trial.

description: The face flanker task; contains the directory to the face image file that is shown during the face flanker task trial.
detail: This variable stores the directory address for the face flanker face shown in each trial.

description: The face flanker task; contains the reaction time values for the responses.
detail: This variable stores the reaction time for the response key presses in the face flanker task.

description: The face flanker task; contains the number of trial in a block.
detail: This variable stores the number of a trial in a block in the face flanker task.

description: The face flanker task; contains the number of block.
detail: This variable stores the number of block in the face flanker task.

description: The surprise memory task; contains the number of trial in a block.
detail: This variable stores the number of a trial in a block in the surprise task.

description: The surprise memory task; contains the number of block.
detail: This variable stores the number of a block in the surprise task.

description: The surprise friendly task; contains the number of trial in a block.
detail: This variable stores the number of a trial in a block in the surprise task.

description: The surprise friendly task; contains the number of block.
detail: This variable stores the number of a block in the surprise task.

description: The face flanker task; contains the inter-stimulus interval time duration
detail: This variable stores the inter-stimulus interval time duration

description: The face flanker task; contains self-reported number of discomfort for error commission
detail: This variable stores the self-reported number by participants in response to the question that asks how much error commission was bothersome

description: The surprise memory task; containes the reaction times for responses
detail: This variable stores the reaction time for the response key presses.

description: The surprise friendly task; containes the reaction times for responses
detail: This variable stores the reaction time for the response key presses.
